pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Petfinder' API Wrapper // Wrapper of the 'Petfinder API' https://www.petfinder.com/developers/v2/docs/ that implements methods for interacting with and extracting data from the 'Petfinder' database. The 'Petfinder REST API' allows access to the 'Petfinder' database, one of the largest online databases of adoptable animals and animal welfare organizations across North America.
